promises.title: OUR PROMISES AND ASSURANCES TO YOU!

iban.title: IBAN:
iban.p1: IBAN is your International Bank Account Number and is now mandatory by EU directive for all transactions post February 1, 2014. If you do not know your IBAN kindly check your bank statement or contact bank.

swiftBic.title: SWIFT-BIC:
swiftBic.p1: BIC or Swift is unique code used to identify your financial institution and is mandatory by EU Directive for transactions post February 1, 2014.
swiftBic.p2: If you do not know your BIC or SWIFT code kindly check your bank statement or contact bank.

contentRow.heading: ISWIM+EXTREME
paragraphs: The iSwim+ Extreme protects your phone from seawater, sand, and anything harmful! It’s a super high-tech product that actually lets you TALK while your phone is in a NASA-grade waterproof pouch.
Plus, you can protect and hide ANYTHING along with your phone! CASH, SMOKES, ID!
Take it everywhere, anywhere, but especially – take it in water so that the iSwim+ Extreme can showcase its full potential.
list: Your cell phone is 100% functional while completely protected.
Powerful 2-way external speaker keeps you in contact or in music.

row3: Card Shield Eliminates Identity Theft By RFID

productSlider.willShip: Your Order will Ship within 24 hours in discreet packaging

contentRow.heading: CARD SHIELD
paragraphs: This Swiss engineered and designed 6-pocket accordion style card holder stops identity theft by blocking radio wave emissions from RFID scanners attempting to steal your personal information.
Sleek and compact, Card Shield is made from a durable light weight high-tech alloy and is also 100% water resistant to keep everything safe and secure.
Card Shield is approved by professional bankers to help protect your identity.
Get your Card Shield today to protect yourself and you’ll never have to worry ever again!

afterButton.text1: Because you bought the LIGHTSTRIKE360, we know you’re an intelligent person who wants to protect your family. You want to be prepared for the worst. Disaster can strike any time, any place. But you can protect yourself with a few easy steps. Included are “secret” tips taught by the military and survivalists, now all condensed for you in an easy to read book that will turn you into an expert!
afterButton.text2: Because you purchased the LIGHTSTRIKE360, you are eligible to download this valuable, feature packed book that will teach you all the secrets of survival. Owning this ebook might literally be the difference between life and death!
afterButton.text3: Learn how to use your new LIGHTSTRIKE360 for protection and comfort!
afterButton.text4: Easy to read, not filled with difficult technical jargon. Just spend a few minutes a day reading the information filled chapters and pretty soon you’ll know as much as the top military trainers in survival and self-defense.
afterButton.text5: It’s the best “upgrade” you can have! You’ve got a great flashlight, now get

afterButton.text7: Act now, and get the book in seconds!!

When the power grid goes down, the LIGHTSTRIKE360 stays on for HOURS & HOURS! Never be “In the dark”.
Your life may depend on getting out of a wrecked building. Your LIGHTSTRIKE360 is wickedly bright. Get through tunnels, sewers, dark passages!
You’ll have a “beacon” of ultra-bright light that can bring help and reunite you with friends and family.
Ways to get away from the urban crazies who might storm your town in search of food!

title1.row2: Make Sure your Friends & Family Are Always Safe!

paragraph1.text2: The Most Underestimated Tool for Personal Defence

paragraph2.text2: Attackers often use the cover of darkness as an advantage. A bright flashlight can help identify threats in low-light, simply shining a light on a bad guy can be enough to get him take off.

paragraph3.text2: Have you ever had a bright light shined in your eyes when it was dark outside? You probably felt disoriented and even blinded for a bit. You can take advantage of that natural reaction to bright light to defend yourself against would be attackers.

paragraph4.text2: Improvised weapon. After you have shined the light in your attacker’s eyes and disoriented him, strike his face with the toothed bezel as hard as you can. The motion should be like stamping him with a giant rubber stamp.

noThanks: I don’t want to keep my friends and family safe

quickUpsell.line4: Get One more DISCOUNT BATTERIES for Only

title1.row2: Every Family Should Have An Extra Flashlight. It is Your Duty

paragraph1.text1: The Dark Can Be a Scary Place - Protect Your Family

paragraph2.text2: Next to a pocket knife, a small, tactical flashlight is one of the most useful and versatile tools a family should have in their every day kit. Count the number of times you’ve been in situations where a flashlight would have been handy, but you were left stumbling in the dark.

paragraph3.text2: As the residents of the East coast have learned firsthand, electrical power can go out at anytime and for long periods. Having a flashlight on you can save time and toe stubs as you navigate about your darkened house or apartment.

paragraph4.text2: In addition to helping you fix wire connections or navigating your home after a power outage, a flashlight can also be used as an effective self-defence tool.

content.text: Lightstrike360 was designed with military and security forces in mind. A durable, long lasting, and efficient source of light that was needed during tactical situations led to the result of the ultimate supreme tactical flashlight – Lightstrike360.

Tested and approved by active soldiers with 5 different adjustable laser focus and 5 emergency response modes, all operated by a simple slide makes Lightstrike360 the world’s leading manufacturer of tactical flashlights.

We know you’ll love Lightstrike360 because we do too! We take great pride in our product and every purchase comes with a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you aren’t completely satisfied with your Lightstrike360 purchase, then you can return it for a full refund!
If you are looking for more information on Lightstrike360 or need help with your Lightstrike360 order then our award winning customer service agents are standing by to assist you!
